title: Jones Bikes adds new 35mm carbon, Aluminum 2.5 loop H-Bars, Grips & Gnarwals
content:
Time to get a grip? Jones Bikes just launched a handful of new options to help you do just that. Updating the available versions of their Loop handlebar, there’s now a lighter aluminum version plus a full carbon option with a 35mm clamp. Toss on some of their Kraton grips in new colors and an […]

The post Jones Bikes adds new 35mm carbon, Aluminum 2.5 loop H-Bars, Grips & Gnarwals appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
